thread.title: 'Third Straw' uncapped to provide Lake Mead water to Vegas
thread.title_full: 'Third Straw' uncapped to provide Lake Mead water to Vegas

title: 'Third Straw' uncapped to provide Lake Mead water to Vegas
text: 'Third Straw' uncapped to provide Lake Mead water to Vegas   8:36 pm People work on a barge used to remove a plug on a new water intake on Lake Mead, Wednesday, Sept. 23, 2015, near Boulder City, Nev. The intake was unplugged Wednesday to finish flooding an $817 million tunnel and complete a complicated "Third Straw" project to draw drinking water for Las Vegas from a shrinking Lake Mead. (AP Photo/John Locher)
